text: Sphenacodon is a genus of sphenacodont that lived during the Early Permian period. Sphenacodon was related to Dimetrodon. == Media == Sphenacodon made an appearance in a famous lost movie called The Lost Spider-Pit Sequence. In the movie, it became described as a huge two-legged lizard, and was inaccurately portrayed as being capable of eating humans. Category:Permian Category:Palaeozoic Category:Reptiles of North America Category:Synapsids Category:Carnivores
title: Sphenacodon
